DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether olopatadine nasal spray is safe and effective when used for up to one year by patients with perennial allergic rhinitis.
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study of Olopatadine Nasal Spray
DOC.criteria: Patients with confirmed diagnosis of perennial allergic rhinitis who are 12 years and older Age 11 years and younger
